ActivityEntryApi_GetList.title: Gets a list of recent activity entries.
ActivityEntryApi_GetList.description:
Entries are always returned sorted from newest to oldest.
            Activity for deleted entries is not returned.

AlbumApi_DeleteComment.title: Deletes a comment.
AlbumApi_DeleteComment.description:
Normal users can delete their own comments, moderators can delete all comments.
            Requires login.

AlbumApi_PostEditComment.title: Updates a comment.
AlbumApi_PostEditComment.description:
Normal users can edit their own comments, moderators can edit all comments.
            Requires login.

AlbumApi_GetNames.title: Gets a list of album names. Ideal for autocomplete boxes.

AlbumApi_GetNewAlbums.title: Gets list of upcoming or recent albums, same as front page.

AlbumApi_GetTopAlbums.title: Gets list of top rated albums, same as front page.

AlbumApi_GetComments.title: Gets a list of comments for an album.
AlbumApi_GetComments.description: Pagination and sorting might be added later.

AlbumApi_GetTracksFormatted.title: Gets tracks for an album formatted using the CSV format string.

ArtistApi_DeleteComment.title: Deletes a comment.
ArtistApi_DeleteComment.description:
Normal users can delete their own comments, moderators can delete all comments.
            Requires login.

ArtistApi_PostEditComment.title: Updates a comment.
ArtistApi_PostEditComment.description:
Normal users can edit their own comments, moderators can edit all comments.
            Requires login.

ArtistApi_GetNames.title: Gets a list of artist names. Ideal for autocomplete boxes.

ArtistApi_GetComments.title: Gets a list of comments for an artist.
ArtistApi_GetComments.description: Pagination and sorting might be added later.

CommentApi_GetComments.title: Gets a list of comments for an entry.

CommentApi_DeleteComment.title: Deletes a comment.
CommentApi_DeleteComment.description:
Normal users can delete their own comments, moderators can delete all comments.
            Requires login.

CommentApi_PostEditComment.title: Updates a comment.
CommentApi_PostEditComment.description:
Normal users can edit their own comments, moderators can edit all comments.
            Requires login.

EntryApi_GetNames.title: Gets a list of entry names. Ideal for autocomplete boxes.

PVApi_GetList.title: Gets a list of PVs for songs.

ReleaseEventSeriesApi_GetList.title: Gets a page of event series.

ReleaseEventApi_GetNames.title:
Find event names by a part of name.
            
            Matching is done anywhere from the name.

ReleaseEventApi_GetAlbums.title: Gets a list of albums for a specific event.

ReleaseEventApi_GetPublishedSongs.title: Gets a list of songs for a specific event.

ResourcesApi_GetList.title: Gets a number of resource sets for a specific culture.

SongListApi_DeleteComment.title: Deletes a comment.
SongListApi_DeleteComment.description:
Normal users can delete their own comments, moderators can delete all comments.
            Requires login.

SongListApi_PostEditComment.title: Updates a comment.
SongListApi_PostEditComment.description:
Normal users can edit their own comments, moderators can edit all comments.
            Requires login.

SongListApi_GetFeaturedLists.title: Gets a list of featured song lists.

SongListApi_GetFeaturedListNames.title: Gets a list of featuedd list names. Ideal for autocomplete boxes.

SongListApi_GetComments.title: Gets a list of comments for a song list.

SongListApi_GetSongs.title: Gets a list of songs in a song list.

SongApi_DeleteComment.title: Deletes a comment.
SongApi_DeleteComment.description:
Normal users can delete their own comments, moderators can delete all comments.
            Requires login.

SongApi_PostEditComment.title: Updates a comment.
SongApi_PostEditComment.description:
Normal users can edit their own comments, moderators can edit all comments.
            Requires login.

SongApi_GetHighlightedSongs.title: Gets list of highlighted songs, same as front page.

SongApi_GetLyrics.title: Gets lyrics by ID.
SongApi_GetLyrics.description: Output is cached. Specify song version as parameter to refresh.

SongApi_GetNames.title: Gets a list of song names. Ideal for autocomplete boxes.

SongApi_GetComments.title: Gets a list of comments for a song.
SongApi_GetComments.description: Pagination and sorting might be added later.

SongApi_GetDerived.title: Gets derived (alternate versions) of a song.
SongApi_GetDerived.description: Pagination and sorting might be added later.

SongApi_GetRatings.title: Get ratings for a song.
SongApi_GetRatings.description:
The result includes ratings and user information.
            For users who have requested not to make their ratings public, the user will be empty.

SongApi_PostRating.title: Add or update rating for a specific song, for the currently logged in user.
SongApi_PostRating.description:
If the user has already rated the song, any previous rating is replaced.
            Authorization cookie must be included.
            This API supports CORS.

TagApi_GetByName.title: DEPRECATED. Gets a tag by name.

TagApi_GetCategoryNamesList.title: Gets a list of tag category names.

TagApi_DeleteComment.title:
Deletes a comment.
            Normal users can delete their own comments, moderators can delete all comments.
            Requires login.

TagApi_PostEditComment.title:
Updates a comment.
            Normal users can edit their own comments, moderators can edit all comments.
            Requires login.

TagApi_GetNames.title:
Find tag names by a part of name.
            
            Matching is done anywhere from the name.

TagApi_GetTopTags.title: Gets the most common tags in a category.

TagApi_GetChildTags.title:
Gets a list of child tags for a tag.
            Only direct children will be included.

TagApi_GetComments.title:
Gets a list of comments for a tag.
            Note: pagination and sorting might be added later.

UserApi_GetCurrent.title: Gets information about the currently logged in user.
UserApi_GetCurrent.description:
Requires login information.
            This API supports CORS, and is restricted to specific origins.

UserApi_PostAlbumStatus.title: Add or update collection status, media type and rating for a specific album, for the currently logged in user.
UserApi_PostAlbumStatus.description:
If the user has already rated the album, any previous rating is replaced.
            Authorization cookie must be included.

UserApi_GetSongRatingForCurrent.title: Gets currently logged in user's rating for a song.

UserApi_PostRefreshEntryEdit.title: Refresh entry edit status, indicating that the current user is still editing that entry.

UserApi_PostSongTags.title: Appends tags for a song, by the currently logged in user.
UserApi_PostSongTags.description:
This can only be used to add tags - existing tags will not be removed. 
            Nothing will be done for tags that are already applied by the current user for the song.
            Authorization cookie is required.

UserApi_GetMessage.title: Gets a user message.
UserApi_GetMessage.description:
The message will be marked as read.
            User can only load messages from their own inbox.

UserApi_GetNames.title: Gets a list of user names. Ideal for autocomplete boxes.

UserApi_DeleteProfileComment.title: Deletes a comment.
UserApi_DeleteProfileComment.description:
Normal users can delete their own comments, moderators can delete all comments.
            Requires login.

UserApi_PostEditComment.title: Updates a comment.
UserApi_PostEditComment.description:
Normal users can edit their own comments, moderators can edit all comments.
            Requires login.

UserApi_GetAlbumCollection.title: Gets a list of albums in a user's collection.
UserApi_GetAlbumCollection.description:
This includes albums that have been rated by the user as well as albums that the user has bought or wishlisted.
            Note that the user might have set his album ownership status and media type as private, in which case those properties are not included.

UserApi_GetEvents.title: Gets a list of events a user has subscribed to.

UserApi_GetFollowedArtists.title: Gets a list of artists followed by a user.

UserApi_DeleteMessages.title: Deletes a list of user messages.

UserApi_GetProfileComments.title: Gets a list of comments posted on user's profile.

UserApi_GetRatedSongs.title: Gets a list of songs rated by a user.

UserApi_GetSongRating.title: Gets a specific user's rating for a song.

UserApi_GetSongLists.title: Gets a list of song lists for a user.
